document.full_text: m.l.s. has altered its schedule to accommodate real salt lake's attempt to become the first league team to win the concacaf champions league.
document.title: m.l.s. gives real salt lake a hand for c.c.l. finals
lines_and_colors: m.l.s. has altered its schedule to accommodate real salt lake's attempt to become the first league team to win the concacaf champions league.
